page.title: 14BUS STATIONS
page.content:
The nearest bus station to Ingoldsby is in Folkingham, about five miles away. It is a private bus company called Kimes Coaches. The first bus leaves at 07.30 and reaches Ingoldsby at 08.10. The first bus arrives in Grantham at 08.30 and is used by children going to school in Grantham and by people going to work in Grantham. There are two daily services and also one that runs on Wednesdays Fridays and Saturdays and one extra one on Saturdays. The service runs from Aslackby to Grantham and goes through many villages including Lenton, Ingoldsby and Humby.
.
